title: Advanced Robotics Bootcamp
subtitle: ROBOTICS COURSE
details: Build complete robotic systems from perception to manipulation using ROS2, Gazebo, and Python
Master computer vision, SLAM, and navigation algorithms for mobile robots
Implement robotic arm control, inverse kinematics, and manipulation planning
Design AI-powered robots with deep learning for object recognition and decision making
about: This is a comprehensive, hands-on program to help you build advanced robotic systems from the ground up. With real-world projects, expert mentorship, and industry-standard tools, you'll develop the skills needed for a career in robotics engineering.

whoIsThisFor.title: Engineering Students
whoIsThisFor.description: Perfect for students in mechanical, electrical, or computer science engineering who want hands-on robotics experience.

whoIsThisFor.title: Software Engineers
whoIsThisFor.description: Ideal for developers looking to transition into robotics and automation engineering roles.

whoIsThisFor.title: Robotics Enthusiasts
whoIsThisFor.description: Build your first robot from scratch. No prior robotics experience needed - just passion for technology.

instructor.name: Harpreet Singh
instructor.bio: Harpreet Singh is a Full Self-Driving (FSD) & Robotics Engineer with 5+ years of expertise in AI-driven autonomy, specializing in motion planning, computer vision, and simulation, who has mentored 10,000+ students globally while founding two award-winning Robotics/AI startups recognized by Startup India and Punjab Government, combining deep technical knowledge in AI decision-making and sensor fusion with a passion for advancing intelligent systems through engineering, education and entrepreneurship.
